Source.Name: libxxf86vm
Source.Summary: X11 XFree86 video mode extension library
Source.Description: libXxf86vm provides an interface to the XFree86-VidModeExtension extension, which allows client applications to get and set video mode timings in extensive detail. It is used by the xvidtune program in particular.
